name: Dragonair
flavorText:
A mystical POKéMON
that exudes a
gentle aura. Has the ability
to change climate
conditions.

previous.name: Dratini
previous.flavorText:
Long considered a
mythical POKéMON
until recently when a small
colony was found
living underwater.

next.name: Dragonite
next.flavorText:
An extremely
rarely seen
marine POKéMON. Its intelligence
is said to match
that of humans.
